channel.title: Friends list bug
channel.description: when you log in most of the time friends will be missing off your friends list you re add them says "10037474644" or whatever is already on your friends list u can remove them and re add and it works fine anyone know how to get rid of this problem for good? my server base is pwnscape

item.title: Friends list bug
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Apparently it isn’t parsing the username.
